attributes.action: Withdraw the Goverments support for Mr Blair to become the 1st president of the new enlarged E.U
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
the e.u. president requires a man/woman of great honesty and integrity. i believe mr blair fails on both accounts. there also appears to be a concerted effort by blair supporters,some who are goverment ministers, to ensure mr blaire is given the job. these plotters no doubt would hope their reward  would enable them to get back on the european gravy train.
the british goverment should have nothing to do with this devious plan.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
